```ts
var price = 100;
price = 200; // 200

const b = "name";
b = "age"; // Assignment to constant variable.
```

JavaScript 

```ts
console.log(x); // : undefined
var x = 5;

console.log(y); // : ReferenceError: y is not defined
let y = 10;

console.log(z); // : ReferenceError: z is not defined
const z = 15;

```


`prettier`  `node_modules` .`.prettierignore` `.gitignore` 

### .prettierignore

 prettier , 

```bash
# Lock files
package-lock.json
pnpm-lock.yaml
yarn.lock
```

### .prettierrc 

[prettier](https://prettier.io/docs/en/options)

```bash
{
  # prettier<int>80
  printWidth: 80,

  # <int>2
  tabWidth: 2,

  # <bool>false
  useTabs: false,

  # <bool>true
  semi: true,

  # <bool>false
  singleQuote: true,

  # objectkey<as-needed|consistent|preserve>as-needed
  #/ as-needed-
  # consistent-
  # preserve-
  quoteProps: 'as-needed',

  #  JSX <bool>false
  jsxSingleQuote: false,

  # <es5|none|all>es5
  # es5- ES5 TypeScript 
  # none-
  # all- JavaScript  ES2017Node.js 8+  TypeScript  2018  1  TypeScript 2.7 
  trailingComma: 'all',

  # <bool>true
  bracketSpacing: true,

  # > HTMLHTMLJSXVueAngular<bool>false

  bracketSameLine: true,

  # <always|avoid>
  # always-
  # avoid-
  arrowParens: 'always',

  # Prettier  pragma Prettier <bool>
  requirePragma: false,

  # Prettier @formatPrettier --require-pragmadoclock@format<bool>false
  insertPragma: false,

  # <always|never|preserve>preserve
  # always-
  # never-
  # preserve-
  proseWrap: 'preserve',

  #  HTMLVueAngular  Handlebars <css|strict|ignore>css
  # css-CSS
  # strict-
  # ignore-
  htmlWhitespaceSensitivity: 'css',

  # vuescriptstyle<bool>false
  vueIndentScriptAndStyle: false,

  # <lf|crlf|cr|auto>lf
  endOfLine: 'lf',

  #  Prettier <off|auto>auto
  # auto Prettier 
  # off-
  embeddedLanguageFormatting: 'auto',

  #  HTMLVue  JSX <bool>false
  singleAttributePerLine: true
}
```

## `package.json`

```json
{
	"scripts": {
		"lint:format": "prettier  {src,mock,library}/**/*.{html,vue,css,sass,scss,js,ts,md} --write"
	}
}
```

# husky

`Husky` `Git` 

`husky + lint-staged``eslint + stylelint + perttier`

## 

```bash
pnpm add -D husky lint-staged @commitlint/cli @commitlint/config-conventional
```

- `husky`: `Git hooks` `git``hooks`
- `lint-staged`: `git add .` 
- `@commitlint/cli``@commitlint/config-conventional`

## lint-staged 

```json
{
	"scripts": {},
	// scripts
	"lint-staged": {
		"*.{js,ts,vue,json}": [
			"pnpm run lint:fix",
			"pnpm run lint:format",
			"pnpm run lint:style",
			"git add"
		]
	}
}
```

`lint:fix, lint:format, lint:style`

- [`link:fix`](/brochure/05_/02_/.eslint.html#package-json)
- [`link:format`](/brochure/05_/02_/.prettier.html#package-json)
- [`link:style`](/brochure/05_/02_/.stylelint.html#package-json)

## commitlint 

`@commitlint/cli``@commitlint/config-conventional``commitlint.config.cjs`

```js
module.exports = {
	extends: ["@commitlint/config-conventional"],
	// 
	rules: {
		"type-enum": [
			2,
			"always",
			[
				"feat",
				"fix",
				"docs",
				"style",
				"refactor",
				"perf",
				"test",
				"chore",
				"revert",
				"build",
			],
		],
		"type-case": [0],
		"type-empty": [0],
		"scope-empty": [0],
		"scope-case": [0],
		"subject-full-stop": [0, "never"],
		"subject-case": [0, "never"],
		"header-max-length": [0, "always", 72],
	},
};
```

`package.json`

```json
{
	// commitlint.config.cjs
	"scripts": {
		"commitlint": "commitlint --config commitlint.config.cjs -e -V"
	}
}
```

## 

### 

```json
{
	"scripts": {
		"prepare": "husky install"
	}
}
```

`pnpm install`, `prepare`,  `husky install``.git``git init`

###

```bash
pnpm exec lint-staged
```

Post.content:
Node+vue node+nvm

nvmgithub1.1.12

nodenvm1.1.111.1.12NVM for Windows should be run from a terminal such as CMD or PowerShell.

nvm1.1.12go

isTerminal()

  1. os.Stdout.Stat()
  2. false
  3. os.ModeCharDevice true false

nodenvmgithubissues

This is due to a change that identifies the terminal. The change was added in 1.1.12 and has been nothing but a pain for everyone. It will be reverted in the next release, but it may be a little while before the next release (our code signing cert was locked when trying to automate the code signing process and Im trying to get it unlocked).

Revert to 1.1.11 for the time being. The changes between 1.1.11 and 1.1.12 are primarily just debugging. Most people wont experience a difference between the two.

:

1.1.12 1.1.111.1.11 1.1.12

nodenvm 1.1.12nvm1.1.11

  1. os.Stdout.Stat()
  2. false
  3. os.ModeCharDevice true false

nodenvmgithubissues

This is due to a change that identifies the terminal. The change was added in 1.1.12 and has been nothing but a pain for everyone. It will be reverted in the next release, but it may be a little while before the next release (our code signing cert was locked when trying to automate the code signing process and Im trying to get it unlocked).

Revert to 1.1.11 for the time being. The changes between 1.1.11 and 1.1.12 are primarily just debugging. Most people wont experience a difference between the two.

:

1.1.12 1.1.111.1.11 1.1.12

nodenvm 1.1.12nvm1.1.11

```sh
# p, pick <commit> = use commit
```
